import React, { Component } from 'react'; import 'react-bootstrap-range-slider/dist/react-bootstrap-range-slider.css'; import RangeSlider from 'react-bootstrap-range-slider'; class FilterComponent extends Component { state={ filter:{ PropertySize:'', photosAvailable:'', Rent:'', } } onInput() { console.log("input event") var input = document.getElementById("rent"); var currentVal = input.value; this.setState({ value: currentVal }) } render() { return (
Filter
Rent
Propert Size
Photos available
); } } export default FilterComponent;
